existing_features.title: Add a clear deployment guide for deploying the app to the Internet Computer (local and mainnet), including prerequisites, build steps, deploy commands, and how to verify the deployed frontend and backend are reachable.

Ensure the frontend can be configured to point to the correct canister IDs and network (local vs ic) at build/runtime, and document the exact environment variables or configuration values that must be set for a production (ic) deployment.

Add a simple post-deploy verification checklist that confirms core backend endpoints and critical user flows work after deployment (e.g., list products, view product details, authenticated add/update/delete from “My Products”).
